accessStatistics.description-detail: Navigates the app to open the sleep statistics screen for viewing tracked sleep data summaries.

startSleep.description-detail: Starts a new sleep session by triggering the app\'s sleep tracking to begin after a short delay.

updateReportDuration.description-detail: Sets the sleep report duration filter to show data from the last month in the app\'s settings.

deleteAllSleeps.description-detail: Deletes all recorded sleep entries after user confirmation, effectively clearing the entire sleep history.
